title: Wicked Words 10
description: Wicked Words 10 is an editor's choice of the best stories published over the past five years of this immensely popular series. Fun, irreverent, and deliciously decadent, this arousing anthology of erotica is a showcase of the diversity of modern women's erotic desires. Lively and entertaining, seductive and daring, this collection combines humor and attitude with wildly imaginative writing. This is the most entertaining erotic fiction for women to be found anywhere in the world.
author: Kerri Sharp
